subject: Basketball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Brandon Rush of the Indiana Pacers was suspended for five games by the N.B.A. for violating the league’s drug agreement, and Tyreke Evans of the Sacramento Kings and Kenny Hasbrouck of the Miami Heat drew suspensions for driving offenses.
snippet: Brandon Rush of the Indiana Pacers was suspended for five games by the N.B.A. for violating the league’s drug agreement, and Tyreke Evans of the Sacramento Kings and Kenny Hasbrouck of the Miami Heat drew suspensions for driving offenses.
